# relative-time

Shows the time relative to a given date as a locale-aware string.

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description | Type     | Default      |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ----------- | -------- | ------------ |
| `date`           | --                |             | `Date`   | `new Date()` |
| `reloadInterval` | `reload-interval` |             | `number` | `1000`       |
